inbound.choose:
<when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("isEventGridSubscriptionValidation"))">
                
                    
                    @{
                          var events = context.Request.Body.As(); 
                          JArray a = JArray.Parse(events);
                          var eventGridData = a.First["data"];
                          var validationCode = eventGridData["validationCode"];
                          var jOutput =
                             new JObject(
                                new JProperty("validationResponse", validationCode)
                             );
                        return jOutput.ToString();
                    }
                
            
            <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("isEventGridNotification"))">
                
                    https://create-api-project.azurewebsites.net/api/create-api-project
                    POST
                    @{
                        JArray eventArray = JArray.Parse(context.Request.Body.As());
                          var subject = eventArray.First["subject"];
                          var eventType = eventArray.First["eventType"];
                          var jOutput =
                             new JObject(
                                new JProperty("subject", subject),
                                new JProperty("eventType", eventType)
                             );
                        return jOutput.ToString(); 
                    }
